About

For 7 years I was a radio journalist in France. I left Paris to Turin, and began self-learning code. Now in Brussels, I practiced and learned more. I like writing in JavaScript and PHP, and using CMS as WordPress. I am curious and continue learning new things as recently, UX writing.

During my free time, I love practicing Yoga, playing video games, reading, or watching Netflix (who doesn't?!). You can also find me on LinkedIn, GitHub and Twitter .
